title.p: Emerging choreographers of the Latvian Academy of Culture

body.p: Following the initiative of Olga Zitluhina, in 1999 the first full time academic BA program of Contemporary Dance was launched at the Latvian Academy of Culture.

It has already become a tradition that “Laiks dejot” presents the performances of emerging choreographers. This year, in collaboration with the Latvian Academy of Culture, the festival offers the performances created as the bachelor’s works.
